text: aur jab Mosa (alaihissalaam) apni khaum ki taraf waapas aaye, ghussa aur ranj mein bhare hoye, to faramaaya ke tum ne mere baadh ye badi bori jaanashini ki? kya apne rab ke hukm se pehle hee tum ne jald baazi kar li aur jaldi se taqtiya ek taraf rakhi aur apne bhai ka sar pakad kar un ko apni taraf ghasitne lage, Haroon(alaihissalaam) ne kaha ke aye mere ma jaaye! 17 Un logo ne mujh ko be-haqiqath samjha aur qareeb tha ke mujh ko qatl kar daale, to tum mujh par dushmano ko math hasaao aur mujh ko un zaalimo ke zel18 mein math shumaar karo
